issue.title: Pelvis vs Foot Orientation after teleport

content.raw:
I've tested with the walking script and I'm seeing the same issue.
I've recorded a video:
https://youtu.be/vzR8NvcJgBE

After two teleports, the first one to the top of the stairs, in which the robot slightly steped on itself, after the second teleport the world drifts more and the robot step on itself and collapses.
